verses.name: 1 Chronicles 17:17
verses.text: And yet this was a small thing in thine eyes, O God; for thou hast also spoken of thy servant’s house for a great while to come, and hast regarded me according to the estate of a man of high degree, O Lord God.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 17:18
verses.text: What can David speak more to thee for the honour of thy servant? for thou knowest thy servant.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 17:19
verses.text: O Lord, for thy servant’s sake, and according to thine own heart, hast thou done all this greatness, in making known all these great things.
